data.message: Can you please stop setting my news feed to 'top stories'? I would like my news feed to remain in chronological order. This way I know what I have & haven't looked at.

replies.message: Hey Sarai. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1vWG4Q0. -Jenny
